name: Hydrating Lip Treatment Oil
about: What it is: A non-sticky oil-to-gloss treatment that adds a comfortable shine while helping hydrate and nourish lips...Formulation Type: Lip Gloss, Lip Balm & Treatment..Benefits: Hydrating..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Baobab Seed Oil: Moisturizes and nourishes lips..- Camellia Seed Oil: Provides long-lasting hydration..- Passion Fruit Seed Oil: Retains moisture, leaving lips feeling soft and supple...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Infused with baobab seed oil and camellia oil, this uniquely nourishing formula cushions lips and adds shine without any stickiness. It comes in sheer shades that flatter every skin tone...Clinical Results: In an independent consumer testing panel of 30 women between the ages of 18-45, after using Lip Treatment Oil:.-97% agreed the product felt hydrating on their lips.-84% agreed the product feels comfortable on their lips.-81% agreed the product does not feel sticky on their lips...Clean at Sephora.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Baobab Seed Oil: Moisturizes and nourishes lips. .-Camellia Seed Oil: Provides long-lasting hydration. .-Passion Fruit Seed Oil: Retains moisture, leaving lips feeling soft and supple. ..Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica Silylate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Mica, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Passiflora Edulis (Passionflower) Seed Oil, Pentaclethra Macroloba Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Aroma (Flavor), +/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe onto bare lips or apply on top of your lip color....Note: If you see any discoloration in your Lip Treatment Oil, rest assured this is simply pigment that was underdispersed during formula processing. Our products have gone through rigorous third party testing to assure the safety and formula stability on and off shelves. Please don't hesitate to let us know if you have further questions or concerns–we're here to help!

reviews.review_title: Poor Quality Control but Deeply Hydrating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture and consistency and the fact that it stays on the lips for hours. It is sticky so if your hair is down, it'll get caught in it.  That said, this bottle leaks like crazy and I too had an issue with a dark mold like substance at the bottom of the tube. I reached out to the brand and they claimed it was unmixed pigment and that it was not mold, however they did not want to share any information about lab results in the tests they ran on the black substance. They claimed it was safe to use and nothing to worry about.  I asked Sephora to ship a new one and it came just the same. I love the feel of this lip oil and the fact that it really does leave my lips more hydrated than before use, but I genuinely question why the brand wouldn't recall these items. As a small brand, I imagine it's not easy and would be a lot of money lost, but it would probably reassure customers that they're dedicated to top quality and nothing less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

The color excellence is a beautiful opaque brownish. It gives me the perfect hint of color. My lips look super duper high effect of glossiness and shine. I love that it doesn’t feel sticky at all. I’m definitely purchasing this product as soon as I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: During winter I need to use a lot of lip products to keep my lips moisturized and lip oil is one of them. I love the color of this lip oil and it instantly makes my dry lips moisturized and shiny，love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice  lip oil. Not sticky and kept my lips from drying out. I love this darker shade. It is a little thicker but has is long lasting which I enjoyed.  I  have been using it on days I don’t wear lipstick. I would recommend and would repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this color on a whim and I love it so much! I usually dont like brown lip colors but the color looks so nice on me. The consistency is so nice and left my lips looking and feeling nice. It lasted long for consistency and the color stayed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Ami Cole in exchange for my honest review. This lip oil is nice and moisturizing. It definitely goes on thick and is pretty heavy. It leaves a very slick shine to my lips. I received the light brown color and it was a nice tint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a stunning! Lip oil I wasn’t so sure about the color but it looks beautiful on the lips. The lip oil feels hydrating and it doesn’t feel sticky or greasy huge plus for me. I highly recommend can’t wait to pick up more shades.

reviews.review_title: One of the best lip oils on the market!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I picked up this newest Ami Cole lip oil shade during the holiday sale and now have all 6 of the lip oils (with one of those received as gratis). The shade Romance is described, aptly for the holiday season, as a cranberry shade, but this beautiful color can be worn all year-round. This is my honest & authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.   WHAT I LIKE: * CONSISTENCY: Thick without being too heavy or goopy; not sticky or tacky * APPLICATION: Applies easily and smoothly; did not smear, bleed or run * PERFORMANCE: Hydrating and nourishing, comfortable to wear; gives a smooth look to my lips (can't see all the lines as easily - a definite plus! in my book) * VERSATILITY: Can be worn by itself, with a lip pencil, or over lipstick * FINISH: Beautiful, richly pigmented color; leaves a gorgeous glossy shine on lips   AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * None, really; but if I'm allowed to be a little greedy, I wouldn't mind if the brand introduced even more shades and finishes. 😉  FYI:  * Unscented (as far as I could tell) * Doe foot applicator * One of my favorite formulations as far as lip oils go * The Romance shade (cranberry) is one of my favorite colors in the lip oil range * Highly recommend * Makes a great gift - for yourself or someone else   BUY 🛍️ or BYE 👋🏼?: * An absolute BUY; this will easily become a repeated repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice high-shine lip oil. It’s thick and a little bit sticky, It gives my dry winter lips an instant hydration boost and a sheen of color. The color is really pretty and it is quite long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a light moisturizing lip gloss with just a tint of color. It is a perfect light wash of color so do not be thrown off by the deep shade. This looks and feels great and is very natural and neutral. This makes me want to try more products from this brand. I recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good lip oil and Ami Cole has really delivered on a hydrating, well-formulated lip oil. It gives my dry winter lips an instant hydration boost and a sheen of color. I love that it isn't too thick or too heavy and is still long-lasting. The color is really pretty and I love that the color stays on for hours after application. I highly recommend making this your go-to lip oil if you're looking for a multi-benefit lip product, especially if you have dry winter lips like I do right now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Ami Cole Lip Treatment Oil is quite long lasting. It gives a beautiful shine and a nice touch of color. It doesn't dry out my lips like other glosses do either. And it also smells/ tastes delicious.  The one thing I would note is that it is a tiny bit tacky and in that way feels more like a gloss than an oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lip oil  from Ami Colé is one of the best that I have used. Non sticky and easy to use, this lip oil glides on smoothly and hydrates at the same time. I really truly love the color and texture as well and would definitely recommend to my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice high-shine lip oil. It’s very thick and a bit sticky, which makes it last quite long. It gives your lips a very pretty subtle sheen of color. The shade excellence looks very dark in the bottle but it really gives you a “my lips but better” type of look. It also smells like rich delicious chocolate cake!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lips feel and look great these days with this lip oil treatment. I love how glossy they look and they have a subtle tint of color. Once it wears off my lips feel soft. This was a great addition to my makeup routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

It should be marketed as a lip gloss not oil. I got the dark brown shade and I was nervous about it being too dark for me but it can definitely sheer out so the color was actually really nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment oil is so so nice!!!! I absolutely love the color a lot. It also was so hydrating on my lips. I loved using it by itself and even on top of my lipstick. I definitely recommend thissss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: 3 starts because of the previous experience
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a sci-fi, tech, type and beauty geek. I prefer makeup, fragrance, fashion, homegoods, gaming and tech over skincare and it's hype. I have combination skin with fine lines and mild texture. I'm fair skin with neutral and cool undertone. I prefer color with a neutral undertone (on occasion with a cool undertone) in mid to deep shades. These are my first impressions.  This lip oil reminds me of another lip oil I love (similar price point). I only wish it were more pigmented. It's a beautiful mid brown shade that needs to be seen. I'm not a fan of the scent, but it's light enough to ignore/not notice it. I would love for the brand to make these more pigmented and to introduce a deep purple (not plum) to the line.  If you're a fan of a cushy and hydrating lippie with a sheer wash of color, you'll love this!

reviews.review_title: The best lip oil out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lip Treatment Oil, imparts a sheer wash of color but also delivers a comfortable shine, making it a standout. It's infusion with baobab seed oil and camellia oil work in harmony to hydrate and pamper the lips, creating a cushiony feel that lasts. The formulation is not only effective but also avoids the common pitfall of stickiness often associated with lip glosses.  It provides a subtle rosy-brown hue that enhances my natural lip color, making it a versatile choice for both casual and more polished looks. For those seeking a non-sticky, hydrating lip treatment with a touch of color, this product is undoubtedly worth exploring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

This formula doesn't just steer clear of stickiness; it's also doing wonders to keep my lips hydrated, giving them this adorable hot cocoa vibe for winter. Got this product for free to spill the tea in this review, and it seriously saved my dry winter lips. The tint? Oh, it's a long-lasting, mega glossy situation in this stunning brown shade that not only suits me but leaves my lips feeling crazy soft and hydrated. If you're after some gorgeous, glossy brown lips, I'm throwing a big thumbs up for this lip oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i think i have a new favorite lip oil… something about this formula is perfect for me! it is in no way sticky and actually hydrated the skin on my lips. the shade excellence gives me the cutest hot cocoa glaze for winter and i’m in love! <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is pretty sticky on the lips, but it lasts for more than a couple hours before i have to reapply. I like the gloss and how shiny it is. It smells pretty sweet, i think its a vanilla scent. I would recommend it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my review. My lips are usually dry and even more so when we are in the winter season. But this girl makes a difference that I love, it gives me hydration but at the same time a nice color. My lips are juicy and hydrated, the best treatment in lip oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this! It wasn’t sticky. It was moisturizing and the shade was beautiful. Sadly, I had to return it to Sephora. I’m not sure if mold was in it or what. Not taking any chances. I only had this for one day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Where to begin? I loved it! I honestly had mix signals on trying this product but I am so glad I did! I applied it before leaving my house in the morning and I have not needed to reapply anything and it’s late in the afternoon. At first it feels sticky but then it just smooth ins with your lips.

reviews.review_title: A great lip oil that adjusts to your natural tone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried this lip oil and it was amazing. It has the appearance of a thick lip gloss and the texture of a smooth lip oil / balm. The color is a deep brown but kind of works with your lip color to create a unique shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip oil has definitely been moisturizing my lips. My lips haven’t felt dry yet! It goes on so smoothly and it’s not sticky. I love that. The color is subtle but pretty. My lips look shiny and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely one of my favorite lip oils. It is so soft, really great size for on the go people, and looks nice on my lips. The color is not that strong as I expected but I feel like that is typical for any lip oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I think this lip oil treatment is decent, but nothing special. While it's okay I can't find anything about it that would justify its price point. The formula is quite sticky, but that didn't really bother me. It just feels like a typical lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Adore this product. The color is very subtle but it feels great on the lips. I would buy again if they weren’t always sold out in this shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lip Treatment Oil from Ami Cole is a little thick but not too much for the texture wise. Feels very moisturizing and lightweight on my lips without being too tacky. I can just slip it in my pocket or my handbag for any on the go moments before heading out the door. Doesn’t smell like anything because there’s no fragrance in the formula. Main ingredients are the different flower seed oils for that extra nourishment factor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product.  This is my first lip oil and this product has given my lips the juiciest shine I've ever had. it's thick but not really sticky. Im not sure if I've gotten updated packaging but mine does not leak. It actually locks close with w little plastic stoppers on the rim. I bought it during the Sephora sale so I'm praying it holds up and I don't experience the mold everyone else is mentioning. I'll be purchasing at least 2 more colors ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this shade, gives your lips a slight sheer red tint! This is now my everyday go to!  Will repurchase another for my mom.

reviews.review_title: More mold growth and bad batch
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately it looks like I received a similar bad batch of product. Super gross, but there is a dark black/blue growth at the bottom of my tube. It's unacceptable to receive this; this company needs much better QC. I just bought this in the Sephora sale, so will need to return soon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this product! My lips look and feel amazing! My only complaint is how it leaks if not stored upright!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the recently released holiday set specifically for the Romance shade and I'm so glad it's been added to the permanent line!  I hadn't tried this lip oil before buying the set but it quickly became a favorite. The smooth gel-like formula has a consistency that's not too thin or too thick and a cushiony texture that hugs the lips without any stickiness.  It's nourishing, fragrance free and lasts longer than any other lip oil I've tried.  Romance is a sheer but slightly buildable brown berry shade that's flattering on all skintones, from the vampire pale (like me) to deep, and the shimmer free finish  gives a plumped look without the minty, cooling or tingling sensation.  I can't recommend this lip oil enough and I'll definitely repurchase Romance once I finish the tube from the set!

reviews.review_title: Weird gunk at the bottom of the tube
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this online during the recent Sephora sale, and after opening up the box, i noticed this black / grey stuff on the side of my tube. I tried scraping the sides of the tube with the applicator to see if it was just trapped product or maybe the lighting doing something weird, but it wouldn’t budge, and it felt off. no idea what it is, but it shouldn’t be there when a lip product is brand new, especially because it’s only on the one side of the oil (see the two pictures for comparison). I was also shocked at how sticky the formulation felt even though this is not a gloss?? super bizzare & disappointed as I love the color and sheerness of the product. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this color and the consistency but after a couple uses, the lip oil started leaking out of the top and the sides are all sticky. Even after cleaning the bottle, it still leaks. Must be a problem with the seal. Bummer about that but still beautiful lip oil. May try to rebuy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like others, mine got moldy after 6 months. Contacted the brand but they just said they don’t think it’s mold. But it’s green and it’s on the bottom and sides of the tube (see photo), whatever it is, and it’s gross. Sucks because the formula is gorgeous, but I will not repurchase an apparently faulty product that goes bad in a few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaked all over the bottom of an expensive purse. I thought it was just me, but reading the reviews I see that is a common occurrence. I really hope they invest in updating the component because the formula is great. I still use the product (I actually have a few colors) but I really try to be careful with it and I’m constantly checking to make sure it’s not leaking, which is a bummer, and I haven’t had this issue with any other brand of gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping this would be nourishing but for me it seems to sit on top of my lips in an uncomfortable way. My biggest draw complaint however is the packaging. The stopper isn’t effective and the product seems to leak out of it making my vanity and purse a gunky mess

reviews.review_title: Love the product hate the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love everything about this lip oil (applicator size, oil thickness, color) EXCEPT for the packaging. The spout where the lip applicator rests is too wide and results in product constantly leaking out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to leave this product a terrible review. I used this for months and at first, I enjoyed it a lot. The wand is fantastic and I love the texture. Unfortunately, after about 4 months, this product developed a rancid food odor. I am not sure what happened to this product, as I have never experienced such an odor from expired lip products. I would not feel safe using this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! Especially the big doe applicator! glazes over my lips all day, and keeps my lipsticks in place longer without overshadowing the color. I prefer this thicker formula because of the protective nature. It’s a glamorous finish, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful lip oil, however it leaks if not stored upright so I cannot keep it in my purse or makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. Extremely hydrating and not too thick, but definitely coats the lips well. The ONLY reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of how quickly I run out of the product. I like to apply gloss throughout the day and the small container coupled with the thick consistency of the gloss it runs out quick. If you are a REAL gloss wearer you will run through this in about 2-3 weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful, deliciously thick, glossy lip treatment. It pains me to leave a bad review but I bought mine in April and within 6m I discovered mold at the bottom (pic attached). I only found the mold after hearing from friends that they found mold in theirs too, so this is not an isolated incident. I really hope they improve the preservation of this product because it's a shame.   As a heads up, if you bought this from sephora, make sure to get your money back within 60 days. They said that since my item wasn't damaged within 60 days, it was not their problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this because  I loved the ingredients listed... however when I opened the tube for the first time... a brown hair was wrapped around the wand. Clearly, this was not a new unused product.  That is unsanitary and frankly disgusting. I wanted to love the product, but unfortunately, I didn't get the chance to even try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this literally everyday. It keeps my lips hydrated and the high shine is so cute!

reviews.review_title: Run, don't walk to get this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw Amani Aliyya (from Married at First Sight) recommend this on IG and it looked SO good on her that I wanted to try it. I am in love with the stuff! It is very hydrating and the perfect mix of an oil and gloss. The color is subtle which I prefer. I even wore it to bed last night and it worked better than what I normally use (Laneige). I have only had it for a couple of days and mine has not leaked at all. Run and get this and you will be supporting a black-owned business to boot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy the look and feel of the lip oil, however if it is not stored completely upright it leaks all over the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cheaper version of the Gisou lip oil. This reminds me of a mix between a gloss and oil. I have very dry lips & this was AMAZING and looks good. I never write reviews, soo buy her!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. Although it is a gloss I’ve been putting it on before bed and have been waking up with the softest lips. Will definitely be picking up the other colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shades and formula but I’ve tried to different shades and they both have leaked everywhere. Really disappointed, hope they can fix the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I already have Excellence and am a huge fan of the formula—hydrating, lush, and long-lasting. 5/17 I may like even more because it is a gorgeous, dimensional color that is flattering on all my friends that have tried it, regardless of undertone or skin color. I have experienced a bit of leaking with the packaging, but it's not enough to deter me from using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG if you don't have this RUN don't walk! It's so beautiful and not heavy or grossly sticky. Top tier perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a wonderful product. Thick but not sticky and so hydrating. I own bliss and smitten

reviews.review_title: 10/10 for people who have lipgloss issues!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can I say this is better than fenty glow without being sacrilegious? Because this is so good. Its a similar color to fenty glow on the lips but i love this so much more and I’ll tell you why. For some reason, fenty glow causes stringy peeling on my lips and it’s so unsightly I can’t wear it. This on the other hand, since it’s a lip oil, nourishes my lips and fades off comfortably. I don’t get the peeling, and it is really flattering. I’m happy I have it, and I hope they release even more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The the tube leaks everywhere, so I have to keep it upright on my desk, where it still leaks. Disappointing for the price, won’t repurchase for that reason. I otherwise enjoyed the formula and shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing lip balm but doesn’t do much otherwise. Will try with brown lip liner as the color (Excellence) doesn’t show up on my lips. I’ve used other brown lip glosses that had a hint of color when applied when applied.

reviews.review_title: If you want goop in your bag buy this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I actually would not recommend it for the price or at all.  To spend as much money as we do on products, you expect certain things from it and this products LEAKS like a leaky faucet.  When i 1st noticed the leak, I sat it up right on my counter and within a couple of days it was sitting in a puddle of itself.  How can you leak standing up right ?!  I don't know if its actually hydrating but the tacky consistency does keep the product on your lips longer than other glossy products.  If they redid the packaging I might repurchase but as of know it will be a quick RETURN.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am a very lught shade girl and i got the ldarkesg shade but everything else very good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my regular everyday lip product! The consistency is thick and substantial. I prefer this to the summer fridays lip balm. This lasts longer and the nourishing aspect is noticeable on my lips after application. My lips get dry easily and this really helps! There is a scent to this lip oil gloss but it has not caused any adverse reaction on me. I have not had any problems with leaking either; I am careful when opening and closing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like Elmer’s glue. Everything else is perfect but the smell is nasty.

reviews.review_title: Not my favorite but not bad!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice product, but everything is just a touch off for me. This is a quality product but I don't enjoy using it for some sensory notes. *Scent: a soft vanilla/gourmand that is nice enough but it reminds me of a little kid makeup set I had in the early 90's that smelled of vanilla and, well, faintly plastic. *Feel: Nourishing and soothing. Not sticky. However, I personally find it to be *so* thick that I hesitate to use it over other glosses. It is viscous in a way that feels like a more liquid Aquaphor. Again this is not a 'bad' thing, Aquaphor is great, but I don't enjoy this sensation on my lips. *Look: Love the color. A soft cozy brown with a subtle shine/glow.
The product is very thick and goopy. It also leaks and will make a mess in your handbag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i always get a lot of compliments when i wear this, the formula is super long lasting and hydrating if you can stand a thick lip oil. it’s definitely sticky but it lasts longer than any other product i’ve tried. wouldn’t recommend if it’s windy outside

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wayyy too sticky. To the point that a strand of my hair got caught in it while I was wearing it, I went  to pull away the strand of hair and instead of coming out of the gloss it came out of my scalp…the oackaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells sooooo good like vanilla cake but it’s not overpowering at all and it’s irritating, which is great because I have really sensitive lips, and the shine is amazing!! last fairly long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product. Feels amazing on the lips. Long lasting. Definitely hydrating. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so bad but I don’t think it’s worth it. Definitely more of a gloss than a lip oil so it’s very sticky and the packages leaks so bad. Not sure if I got a defective product but it’s really annoying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip oil. It isn't thick and goopy  Just the right consistency and feels nice on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, rich lip oil. Lasts long and I love this color especially. It’s got a great applicator and honestly is better than the Dior ones. It’s got a nice shine to it, but I would not quite put this in a gloss category. It’s not super thick, but it’s not a thin oil. It’s a happy inbetween. The price is good and so is the product. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip oil is also very good and it’s beautiful on the lips .

reviews.review_title: I need all the shades asap!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried lip oils before and it's safe to say that I was not very impressed at all. However, I am almost out of my previous favorite lip product and for some reason kept feeling called to purchase a brown/bronze shimmery gloss. I say previous because I can't live without this lip oil now. I put it on immediately after opening the package and results were almost instant! Before applying my lips were very dry and cracked. Cue drinking coffee and having a snack and not only was most of it still on, but I had actually forgotten I was wearing it (it's that comfortable). I swiped it off after eating so that I could reapply and my lips were now so soft. It's definitely thicker than the oil I tried before but it does clearly say on the package that it's a oil to gloss formula and that's exactly what it is. It's not too thick and sticky nor is it too slippery and thin. I wear mine by itself or with brown lip liner and love it so much. Bonus points for all the good stuff about it! Definitely gives this a try❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like that it’s hydrating and looks cute;however, I don’t like the stickiness. It reminds me of lipgloss that has oil in it that last but leaves sticky residue on whatever you eat r drink with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I previously purchased Bliss and it’s so pretty! The color Smitten is a great bright but sheer color. I like the fairly thick texture because it lasts a long time and is very hydrating. Absolutely in LOVE with these lip pies!

Absolutely gorgeous lip oil. Bliss is a lovely color. I would not describe this as sticky but more like grippy or substantial. It lasts on the lips with a very comfortable and hydrating feeling. There is also a slightly vanilla scent that is lovely and not overwhelming. The packaging is lightweight and I have heard people have issues with leaking so I haven’t taken it out and about since I don’t want to risk it. I wish the packaging was more lux and didn’t leak but the product itself is amazing. I hope Ami Colé comes out with more shades and fixes their packaging issues!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is my favorite! I've tried all of the other popular lip oils, and they are all either too fragranced or flavored (both of which give my lips a rash or burn), but these are not flavored, the scent is almost undetectable (slight vanilla scent maybe?) and they feel so nourishing on the lips. They really last too! Most other lip oils disappear quickly and need multiple reapplications. I would be excited to see more colors!

reviews.review_title: Sweet scent, lip gloss feel, decent longevity
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The plush, deeply angled doe-tip applicator is just the right vehicle to deliver a sweet concoction of vanilla cream-soda scented nourishment to parched lips. If you are looking for a thin, disappearing layer of oil, this is not it. Likewise, if an excessively goopy gloss is your thing, this may disappoint. On a scale of 1-10, 1 being a thin oil, 10 a thick gloss, it would happily settle right around 4. I apply it as a second layer while masking, finishing with a lip mask prior to heading to bed. If you are looking for a middleweight lip oil, this just might be it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: literally so good. this lip oil is the only lip oil i’ve ever used this much and has felt soo good on my lips. my only complaint is it runs out fast. other than thatttttt, amazingggg

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The consistency of this lip oil is very thick. So you need to be careful not to apply too much otherwise it will drip. It does work! My lips were very dry and chapped and this product made my lips feel soft and nice within the hour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I happily received the Ami Colé Lip Treatment Oil to try from Sephora’s Beauty  Insider Community and wanted to share my honest review. This one goes on smooth and feels more like a gloss 5an an oil once on. When I use this at night, I find it is still on my lips in the morning and my lips feel silky and smooth and hydrated. It’s really nice to find something that works and stays on overnight! During the day, it also has nice staying power. It has a light vanilla cake type scent, only on first application, and it has a large doe foot applicator. Honestly, I probably wouldn’t have picked this up myself, but I realize I didn’t have a clear lip oil like this, only tinted ones, and this is so much better for nighttime when I don’t need any color that can transfer to sheets, pillow, etc. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite new lip oil!  It smells just slightly of vanilla cake and looks amazing on my lips.  The shine is so pretty.  I use this both as a lipstick substitute and as a night treatment.  The applicator is nice and big for great coverage on the first swipe.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite clear lip oils!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3 of the lip oils in this collection and love them and was happy to see this clear oil in a gratis package. This is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  WHAT I LIKE:  * Hydrating and nourishing  * Not sticky or tacky * Comfortable to wear  * Applies easily and smoothly  * Leaves a beautiful, glossy shine on lips * Wears well alone, with a lip pencil or over lipstick * Great year round  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT:  * Love the colors in the range, but wouldn't mind if more shades added  FYI / OTHER THOUGHTS:  * One of my favorite clear lip oils     * Unscented  * Doe foot applicator  BUY or BYE?:  * BUY, BUY, BUY 🛍️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip oil! It’s nice and thick but doesn’t feel sticky, it’s very glossy, and it’s long lasting. I did receive it gratis from Sephora in exchange for my honest review. I highly recommend it and will be picking up one in a different color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lip oil is great!! I love the soft pink color. It is quite a thick formula which I personally enjoy. Super high shine as well. One thing I haven't seen anyone point out is how this lip oil seems so have a smoothing effect at least for me. When I put it on, the lines and creases in my lips disappear making them look like glass!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip gloss I have ever used, I buy them multiple at a time, esp during the Sephora sale. The thickness and tint are perfect and they feel moisturizing without being too oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it goes on so well...and keep my lips feeling hydrated

reviews.review_title: Thick more than sticky. HIGH SHINE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a high shine oil to gloss formula. When first applied, I found it to be hydrating and non sticky. This being said, the formula is  pretty thick. I think some people confuse it’s thickness for sticky. The difference is when I talk or open my mouth my lips don’t feel tacky and I can’t feel them stick together as I  pull apart. However, it is not a lightweight formula so you do feel it on your lips and as the formula wears down  after a few hours or after it is removed the residue left over  can feel slightly tacky (but it’s slight and overtime). To get the residual feeling to go away you have to use some sort of makeup remover (oil, balm, micellar water).   After removing the oil, my lips don’t feel dry but they don’t necessarily feel nourished either. I have the clear shade; reflection,  and I like to wear it both alone and over top of other tints to give my lips a high shine effect. I don’t feel like the packaging is messy, and I do like the big applicator foot. It has a very subtle sweet scent. So subtle your nose really has to be up against the oil to smell it. But it is pleasant.Overall, this is a nice formula for other great ingredients. If you don’t mind a thick oil, you should like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new color for the summer! It's going to be a staple in my bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment oil is very hydrating, shiny, and leaves my lips nice and soft. What impresses me most about the product is that while it isn’t tacky, it’s thick enough that it stays on my lips for quite a few hours without needing to reapply it. I have only tried the reflection/clear shade, but I like it enough that I plan to try some of the other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this color, the brown color, and the newest shimmer. These glosses have replaced my fenty! I’m already on my second tube of bliss. The new shimmer shade is really cute with a brown liner. They feel and look great. I Loveeee.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this product after finally succumbing to their Mascara which I really really like. The presentation of the Rosy Brown color looked perfect to me and I love a good lip gloss or oil, the problem with this particular lip gloss is that when applying it does promise a nice color but it soon fades and the color is neither Rosy or Brown..it's just another clear lip gloss. But the worst part for me was that after it being applied it creates a nasty looking film on the corners of my lips which is not attractive at all!! I think when it comes to lip glosses that give u a nice full glossy pout I will stick with Lawless. So far my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip treatment it's so nourishing. My lips feel so soft, smooth and not at all sticky. Since using this I've noticed my lipstick goes on much smoother also. A great lip product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have transparent shade reflection , love applying over my matte lipsticks , looks gorgeous and juicy, also love that it has amazing skincare properties camelia seed oil and passion fruit seed oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip oil not only gives me a gorgeous non-sticky shine, like a lip gloss, but it leaves my lips feeling so conditioned and moisturized, with ingredients like baobab seed oil, camellia seed oil and passion fruit oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If I'm being honest, I'm not someone who generally likes lip oils but I keep hoping that I'll find one that I genuinely like.  I don't think that this is it.  It's a little thicker (which I actually DO like) but it doesn't feel particularly hydrating or nourishing.  It's a little glossy but that's about the extent of it for me and I have other products that I prefer over this one that give that same effect.  Not a bad product, just not a fav.  *I received this in gratis as a Sephora Community Ambassador

reviews.review_title: Mid at best if we’re honest
reviews.review_text: I liked:  - the color: Bliss is a sheer, subtle wash of pink - the tenacity: stays put, reminiscent of Mac Lipglass  I didn’t like: - the applicator: how and why are there still leaky glosses in the year 2023? Bonne Bell flashbacks - the formula: makes my lips burn ever so slightly, tends to leave them dry and irritated. Difficult to apply evenly, at least for me. It has a tendency to pool on certain parts of the lip, and slip away on others, as it wears   It’s not horrible but not worthy of the hype in my opinion. Off the top of my head, I’ve enjoyed the Kaja, Fenty, and Pat McGrath glosses all quite a bit more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never obsess over lipgloss but this proved me wrong. It has a smooth (not sticky) texture, with the right amount of thinkness to stay put. It also does NOT gather and turn white in the corners. This is the first gloss that I have tried where I don’t have to pre moisturizer my lips, due to the types of oils contained. It has a slight tint that goes with the everyday casual look but also goes with dressy loos as well. The only con is with the packaging; if not closed super tight, it will leak a bit. I ordered all colors and can’t wait to try the others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi! I am a Sephora beauty insider community ambassador and this is my honest and authentic review of this product.  I love the applicator on this lip oil, it distributes the perfect amount of product. The scent is delicious, it reminds me of light vanilla frosting. The oil is great, hydrating and moisturizing without any tackiness or drying of my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  The product definitely gives your lips a high shine. I used it more like a lip gloss on top of a balm and felt it kept my lips hydrated for more than 4 hours without having to reapply while still looking glossy. The product has a nice applicator which makes it easy to apply the product to the lips in one take. I appreciate that the formula isn’t tacky but is more on the thicker consistency side than normal lip oils and love the gloss shine it gives.  I have already been looking at other shades and have even gifted one to another BIC member because she raved about the product and wanted it in a different color for the Galentine gift exchange.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone that is interested in a lip oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice thick but not tacky oil/gloss. It feels more like a gloss to me. I have very dehydrated skin and almost all lip glosses/balm/etc immediately sink into my lips and disappear and need reapplied constantly. Not this one! It lasts hours. I can go to sleep and wake up with it still on my lips. I think the applicator is quite large so this will get used up quickly. And I will buy more. I did receive this as a gratis from Sephora and these are my honest thoughts as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wanting to love. It’s not really hydrating, but also don’t feel like my lips are terribly flaky and dry like others on the market can do. The color is lovely. I have this and smitten. The worst, the container leaks. You really need to be sure it’s tighten, but even then I find the sides sticky :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this new color. I own every shade of this lip oil because the formula is just perfect to me. Very hydrating, lasts forever, and not too sticky. I also like this shade a lot. It’s very similar to the original shade but with a very subtle gold shimmer. I’ll admit it looks like a lot when first applied but it’s actually pretty subtle, which is how I like it. Thank you Ami Cole for gifting me this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating and feels luscious on the lips. Quite thick and sticky though. The packaging also leaks pretty badly. Do not carry in purse or store on its side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip oil. It keeps my lips moisturized without feeling sticky. This is the third color I own (also have Bliss and Smitten - absolutely obsessed with this brand). The packaging and attention to detail is top tier, plus the lip oil has a subtle sweet scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this lovely lip oil to try by AMI Cole. I was super excited because I never received anything for free and I have their other lip oils except for the clear version which I really love. So this lip oil is very pretty, it's a nude kind of shade. The Shimmer is very subtle which I love Shimmer anyway. if you have any of the other lip oils from this brand that you know what to expect in terms of how long it's going to last and how moisturizing it is. I already bought a second one of this just to have it when I run out of this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already have 3 of the shades, but this one is by far my favorite. I love the golden shimmer and the fact this gloss is not sticky. It feels great on my lips. It's going to be amazing for vacations!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: EXCELLENT gloss, I have repurchased twice already and that really says a lot because I rarely repurchase things. I wear this light pink shade with a lipliner and I’m constantly being asked what I’m wearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice shine, but did not feel great on my lips. Felt a burning, so I had to remove it shortly after applying. I generally have sensitive skin, so not something I can recommend if you have this also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This new color is amazing, this will be my fourth color that I have added to collection. Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the addition of a golden glittery gloss to my ami cole lip treatment oil collection. The shimmer in this color is suble but my lips still sparkle!

reviews.review_title: A must have cushiony lip oil!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best formula!!!   And this new color is the perfect nude with a hint of a subtle sparkle.  I have a lip treatment oil in my car, handbag, gym bag, vanity - a forever staple!!  Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loving the new shade! -- feels great on my lips and adds a nice bit of sparkle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love every shade of the Ami Colé Lip Treatment Oils and this one does not fall short. It’s a perfect shade that warms of the lips to complete a neutral to even a golden, bronze or rose gold look. Pick one up today!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ami Cole's Lip Treatment Oil is EVERYTHING! How it can be full coverage yet light without being sticky or goopy is amazing. Bliss is the latest shade I've purchased and it's the perfect nudey-pink for us melanated babes. Seriously, I'm thinking of tossing out/recycling my old makeup and just sticking with the entire Ami Cole line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have so many of these lip oils and won’t be stopping any time soon. They are perfect especially if you have a darker skin tone. The new shade is a welcome addition as the gold flecks really make your lips and skin pop. Just in time for summer,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm a fan. I have every shade of their gloss and was excited to try this one. Honestly, I am never a fan of shimmers but this one is so subtle that it feels like it just brings out the gold in my skin. I recommend. Also, their packaging is top tier and I feel like such a luxury gworl every time I get something from them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not even a huge fan of sparkly shades , but this one is beautifully subtle and a great nude for my skin tone. And of course, I love the long lasting wear of ALL the Ami Cole lip oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy the shine this gives. However, I haven’t found it to be moisturizing and it constantly leaks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just when I thought my lips would be giving Excellence all Summer 2023, in walks this nude with the perfect gold shimmer! I am usually hesitant to go with gold shimmer lip glosses because I feel like they don’t do my fuller lips any favors, but in this case I stand forever corrected. This is definitely a nude but with the perfect pop of shiny shimmer in the gold. It is neither too yellow or too orange, it lives somewhere in the middle, so it compliments a myriad of skin tones, from deeper to fairer. As with all of Ami Colé lip treatment oils, this feels light going on with a coverage that is incredible. It’s long lasting but your lips will never realize it. I wore it alone and was really pleased to have the subtlety of a nude with the playfulness of the shimmery look. It wasn’t over the top, nor was it indistinguishable. I also paired it with a chestnut lipliner for a darker shade and it held up even better—dare I say it— than my fave Excellence! This is great for every day wear or for going out. Lined, unlined, whatever. This is such a beautiful shade. Definitely putting this one on a subscription!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite gloss! Whoever I wear it I receive compliments. It’s just enough color! The perfect combination of a full gloss but also hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Ami Cole glosses are are just 10/10. This new shade is so beautiful and I love how subtle the gold glitter is on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product and I love it! It's shimmery, glossy and feels good on my lips. I like that it doesn't wear off quickly and it makes my lips look kissable in these summery streets. Fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: a beautiful product with a subtly delicious scent. I own three shades and rotate depending on my vibe. the gold shimmer is gorgeous for a night out. another win from Ami Colé.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased from the brand before and have yet to be disappointed. They consistently deliver high-quality items that work as promised .This particular brand has lip oils that truly keep your lips moisturized all day without leaving that sticky feeling. It's the only one I've found that actually works for me.  Recently, I tried their new shade, and I have to say, I'm in love. It gives you a subtle pop of color with the perfect amount of gold shimmer that will look good on every complexion. I highly recommend giving it a try if you're looking for a new lip product. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really enjoying this new shade of the lip treatment oil and it’s the perfect shimmery nude for summer! This shade in particular feels extra hydrating while not being goopy or thick. I’m looking forward to getting a lot of use of this!

I didn’t think that I could love Ami Cole￼ anymore than I already do. Excellence is my go to lipgloss but this nude with the shimmer is everything. Perfect for summer, but I think I will wear this all year round!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ami Colé never ceases to amaze me every time they come out with a new product. Their lip products specifically are luscious  and smooth..not sticky AT ALL! This shimmer shade is so gorgeous and the perfect shimmy topper to any lip neutral lip combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ami Cole always hit the mark! Great shine, beautiful color and same moisturizing formula as the other Lip Oil shades. This one may actually be my favorite. You'll want to wear it every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm constantly searching for products that will give me the perfect early-aughts video girl glow. You know what I mean: perfectly even skin, pop of blush, hint of highlight, and sun-kissed lips — but the Black-girl friendly version.   This new Ami Colé oil is exactly that. I own Excellence, Bliss, Smitten, and *love* the latest lip oil launch. As soon as I saw the tube, it reminded me of my first and favorite MAC lipglass 'Oh Baby.' Those familiar know 'Oh Baby' is a golden, shimmery brown gloss, but the Ami Colé version doesn't have the chunky gold glitter so it's better. Feels great on the mouth and wears wear with and without liner. Love wearing with Ami Colé complexion products, specifically Desert Date Cream Blush & Lip Multistick in Dune.   TL;DR: perfect summer lip oil and I'm buying one for every bag this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ami Cole is hands down one of the most consistent beauty brands. Their tint + mascara are apart of my beauty holy grail, but this lip oil is in a league of its own! First off the oil smells AMAZING, the application is smooth, non sticky and keeps my lips supple and glossy! The shade itself (an actual brown girl friendly nude!) is super soft and pretty. makes my lips look edible lol I already know it’ll be the main one I reach for this summer! I’ll definitely buy this shade to gift to my loved ones and stock up on. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using ami cole's lip treatment oils for a few months now, and I am definitely a loyal customer. The formula is so moisturizing without being too sticky, and this new shade is super pretty, a natural rosy color with subtle shimmer. it will definitely be in my regular rotation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never received a free product before, so I was elated when Ami Cole reached out to me with an offer to send their new shade to try. I've ordered multiples of every single shade they currently offer from Ami Cole directly, and have also purchased a backup of Excellence from Sephora. I guess you might say I'm a bit of a fan of this product, lol.  The new shade is absolutely gorgeous. Its a sheerish nude with very fine, non-gritty gold shimmer. I think it's absolutely perfect for all skintones and for summer. the formula is the same one we know and love. To me, this is essentially skincare. SO hydrating and flattering, insanely comfortable. It's not super long-wearing, but no product of this nature is. And it's an actual joy to reapply. While the color doesn't last like it would with a lip stain or bullet lipstick, the hydration genuinely does.  I photographed the new next to some of the other shades I have. I couldn't find my Bliss so that one isn't pictured. I'm so excited Ami Cole is branching out into shimmer and I hope they release endless more shades. Goodness knows I'll buy them all, probably multiple times over. This lip oil is definitely my best find of 2023; I'm calling it now and the year's not half over.  In the first photo, you see the new shade next to Excellence (which is on the left). In the second photo, the lineup from left to right is: Reflection, Smitten, Excellence, & then the new shade (I'm not sure at the time of posting this review what the shade name was will be).  Many thanks to Ami Cole for sending this beautiful product to me for review. I usually side-eye incentivized reviews, but like I said I've spent a lot of my own money (over $200) on multiples of each existing shade. It really is that good. And a major bonus is the opportunity to support a Black-owned brand that creates products with deeper skintones in mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved every single shade of this lip treatment oil and this new nude shade is no exception! As always, it was moisturizing but not sticky and also works really well with my two toned lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this new addition to my Ami Colè family. It hs the same formula at the previous lip oils but includes golden flecks. Perfect and just in time for the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lip oils are the best glosses/lip oils ever. They keep my lips so soft and hydrated. I own every color of this lip treatment oil. This color is definitely going to be my summertime lip oil/gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Ami Colé lip treatment oil, it keeps my lips so soft!  It isn't a heavy sticky gloss like some others can be. It's comfortable, weightless, and it has a long lasting shine. This is a definite must-have; I am hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ami Colé lip oils! This one is so pretty and I can see it working well with most, if not all, skintones. The formula allows for a smooth application; since trying out this color, I have grown a bigger appreciation for how moisturizing and nice this product is on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty shimmer nude brown. Same great formula. AMICOLE Please keep making more colors and I will keep racking them up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to try out, I love it! The first thought that came to my mind was, this lip oil is just in time for summer.  It glides on smooth and is a beautiful color.  It has just enough shimmer without being overbearing.  I highly recommend this lip oil.  I already own three others.  I love Ami Cole.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product for free as a longtime fan of the brand! I’m a devotee of the original Excellence shade, and only recently adventured into Smitten. This new shade is a golden bronze—reminiscent of early 2000s MAC lip glosses. I was worried the shimmer would affect the texture, but it goes on as smoothly as the original formulas. Ami Cole does it again!

reviews.review_title: Love the texture and coverage of these glosses!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own three of these glosses.  I love the texture & coverage.  No nasty taste.  This one is a super pretty color for warmer complexions.  I am a cooler complexion with light skin and would prefer a cooler pink color.  It blends beautifully with other glosses so I will be able to mix it and love it.

reviews.review_title: Just What You Need for Summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a STAN of AC's lip oils. They provide lush & effortless coverage for my two-toned lips. I don't even buy lipstick anymore. This new shade provides me with the perfect pout. It makes me look sun-kissed and I like that.

reviews.review_title: A lovely formula in a wearable nude shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this formula, and 5/17 is just as wearable and nice as the other shades I own. The formula is nicely moisturizing and glossy without any stickiness. This shade is a sheer nude with subtle shimmer.

reviews.review_title: The only lip oils you need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lip oil from Ami in exchange for a review since I have been a loyal customer of their lip oils. These are the most hydrating and flattering lip oils I own and the nude with gold shimmer is a great addition to their line up. I have olive/yellow/tan skin with brown/pink lips and the shade really complements and enhances everything. I think it’s perfect for a night out, whereas the other shades are great for daytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really juicy lip oil. It feels more like a thicker gloss than oil, and because of that it’s a bit sticky but also quite moisturizing and nourishing. I even tried it as a lip sleeping mask and it was still there and juicy the next morning. It’s also more pigmented than the typical lip oil.  I’m not fond of vanilla/sweet scents, so one star off for the fragrance. A lot of people love it, though.   Photo has it applied to the left side of my lips only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a huge fan of the Ami Cole brand since discovering them last Summer! The lip treatment oils are my go to purchase! Excellence and Bliss stay in rotation! They glide on easy, never sticky, super moisturizing with just the right amount of sheen! Super excited to have been selected to try out their latest shade! The nude w/ gold shimmer is definitely another winner in my book! Rock it alone, or add or add a nice chocolate liner for an extra pop! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Ami Cole lip oil for its conditioning properties, realistic vanilla scent and thick texture.  I also find that the wand has these soft ridges that can gently exfoliate the lips.I have owned the shade excellence, gifted the clear one, and received rose gold for review from Ami Cole. Rose gold has all the properties I listed above but with a shade that is illuminating. I find that Rose gold has this beautiful warmth and complex shimmer that makes the lips glow. It's still smooth and has no weird shimmer or glitter texture. Great job Ami Cole! Cue Amerie Why Don't we Fall in Love and wear this gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment oil is nourishing and high shine as the other shades. Pros: I can wear it without a lip liner.           I don’t feel the gold shimmer. Ps. Please release a bright orange Lip Treatment Oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the lippies by Ami Colé but this one?! Perfect for the summer. I always pair my gloss with a brown lip liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product earlier today and immediately applied it to my lips. I believe this shade will shine in the spring/summertime. Lots of shine + glitter. As always, the formula is the BEST!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wowie! This rose gold shimmer is soooooo pretty and gives me romantic summer vibes. I am obsessed. I’ve been a proud supporter of Ami Cole since the brand launched two-ish years ago, and the lip treatment oils are my favorite product. They are extremely moisturizing and automatically elevates your lip and your whole face. Feels luxurious every time.  I cannot live without them and routinely will find up to 3 of these oils in my bag because I am constantly throwing them in there out of fear of going without. The oil is literally on my lip 24/7 and sometimes I’ll dab it on top of lipstick too. My favorite up to this point has been “excellence” (I’ve tried them all but bliss, which is on my list) however, this rose gold shimmer might take the #1 spot. On my lips it shows up as a lighter version of excellence. This color and the lip oil formula (in general) is absolute perfection and you need it now. 10/10 recommend. Thanks so much Ami Cole for continuously blessing us melanated gals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lip oils are amazing in general - I've gone through several bottles of the shade Excellence and have gifted Bliss to a couple of my friends. (This is saying something, as I had never gone through an entire container of any cosmetic lip product before!) They're so moisturizing... my lips have never felt better, even during the winter months. As a result of going through so many of these lip oils, the company was generous enough to offer me a free one in this newest shade in exchange for my review.  This shade is really beautiful and looks pretty similar to Excellence on my lips. However, Excellence is more of a high shine/gloss finish, whereas this one has a subtle shimmer that reminds me of Ami Cole's highlighter. I will definitely restock when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ami Cole!!!  I was sent this lip oil pre-launch and asked to provide an honest review. Not sticky, very moisturising with just enough shine. I’ve been faithfully using Excellence for about two years now…BUT Nude with Gold Shimmer my now be my favorite!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loveee Ami Cole’s Lip Oil and this new shade is no exception. I received this product in exchange for a review, but I am an avid fan and own all shades, some a couple times over.  I love how moisturized my lips feel even a few  hours later when the shine has dulled.  Smitten is my current go to, but I see myself transitioning to this nude with gold shimmer for my bronzed summer look. Get at least two, you’ll be mad at yourself otherwise!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my purse at all times - buy several
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this to review. I LOVE IT!!! Have purchased the other colors, but this one is the prettiest yet. The nude shade is perfect and the gold shimmer is next level. I already knew that the consistency and moisture-level were among the best oils I've tried, but the colors just keep getting better - super flattering. A must have in my purse at all time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw reviews on TikTok, and I had to try it. This shade is beautiful; the oil is thick and hydrating. I plan to get more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Already a major fan as the product  is magnificent at providing great hydration and slip on you lips with no sticking  or feathering. This shade is a subtle sheer glow as opposed to the sheer tint and shine of the other shades.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful shade of nude for anyone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this product for free for an honest review. The color is gorgeous. The gloss has specks of shimmer that make it look even shinier, but you can't see the shimmer unless you're up close or in the sun. The product adds a made-up look to any look, and I love that I could use it with or without a liner. It lasts a long time and isn't sticky. I love the big doe-foot applicator and the sturdy feel of the container. Thank you, Ami Cole, for sending me the product and allowing me to try it. I almost like it more than the shade Excellence.

reviews.review_title: Didnt hydrate lips, stayed sticky and lips cracked
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this lip oil for several weeks halfway through the bottle, and I hate to say it as I was trying to support a black owned brand, but this does not work for me. It’s thick and sticky and doesn’t soak into my lips over time. I actually had a lip split while using this due to dryness. I’ll be returning the other shade I bough unfortunately. mylips over time. It

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this shade for an honest review. I love love love this shade. The oil last for a long time, keeping my lips moisturized. The shade is amazing and glides on easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this free for review from Ami Cole. I’m an avid lover of the original Excellence shade, and have panned quite a few. I can already tell this shade will be no different! The formula is the same nourishing oil, but in a warm rose gold. Hands down my favorite lip oil to date, and I’m grateful to have received it.

reviews.review_title: messy product. too expensive for what u r getting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this was a unique shade but a very goopy product in cheap packaging.  I'm really taken aback at the cost given what you are getting and how messy this gets since it is stringy. it's so hard to keep it inside the tube bc a little gets all over every time u go to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is a beautiful shade but it is very, very stringy. it's messy to use and wear. the tube gets sloppy right away bc it is so stringy when u take it out of the tube to apply. also it migrates.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this formula it’s thicker like a gloss but very smooth and not at all sticky, super hydrating as well. Feels kinda like mac lipglass and fenty gloss bomb had a baby. definitely getting more shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This oil works as a moisturizer, overnight treatment, and gloss! I love it so much. Got it as a birthday present. I’m always looking for a lip  moisturizer that won’t taste bad and glides and  blends. This is my favorite! Fulfills every lip product need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss. It is kind of thick and sticky but I like that because it lasts. The color Bliss is a pretty light pink color. I’m getting the bright pink one next.

reviews.review_title: Best lip oil in my collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
