reviews.review_text: I own just about every lip gloss and oil out on the market right now. This one is my favorite for a couple of reasons. The pigmentation is fantastic! It's a beautiful shade of pink that actually shows up on your lips! Which is so rare when it comes to a lip oil. Also, the formula is great, super unique in my opinion. It's really thick and shiny when first applied. But after it's warmed up on your lips, it thins out a little bit while still remaining shiny. It was a great addition to my collection and I'm going to order one in every shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It looks like I'm in the minority here. I found this sticky and Excellence is a weird brown, not at all rosy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color. I have a ghostly pale skin tone and it’s nearly impossible to find lip products that are a very nice amount of sheer and that don’t show up orangey on my skin tone. This is a true nudey brown and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant at first to buy this because of the price but I took the plunge and am so glad I got it! I like that it lasts a long time on my lips even when drinking water or coffee. Smitten is such a BEAUTIFUL pink color as well! So glad I got it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I naturally have darker lips so I like lip products that can add some pink hues and add more color to my lips. I got this lip oil in Bliss and it’s unfortunately not pink enough for me hence why I took off a star. I know the name says subtle so perhaps this would have a better color pay off for people who had really pink lips. But aside from that, this is very much like the super famous lip oils- it’s thick, adds tons of shine to the lips and it stays on for a while!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this lip oil in Smitten and LOVE it! Nice, thick, juicy gloss that doesn’t go away too soon. Not sticky. I’ll be buying the other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail lip oil- juicy, glossy, luscious payoff!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay. It smells good and glides on smoothly but leaves a sticky feeling on my lips after it wears off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m normally a matte wearer but I figured I’d give this a go as a topper. I LOVE it. For me it’s a little to sheer on its own but wow, it adds another dimension to my current line up of lippies. Very glad I purchased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a cute lip oil , but the product does leak and it’s really sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered bliss and I'll be returning it. very thick and sticky makes it hard to spread these formulas usually dry my lips out, and the color bliss just does nothing for me I much prefer tower28 pistachio. The smell is nice just like a Mac lipstick. overhyped imo.

reviews.review_title: Great product but leaks way too much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product itself. I have received compliments and love the consistency and color. It’s the perfect nude color for black women. I also don’t find it to be too sticky. It feel’s hydrating. However the packaging needs to be fixed. It leaks so bad and has gotten all over my hands and purses. I now have to wrap it in a napkin so it won’t get on anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip gloss I have ever used! I struggle with dry lips and sometimes nothing works. This lip gloss leaves me feeling hydrated for hours. It’s a nice sheer color, so it will work for any skin color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so I love the pink color, and it actually stays put for quite a while. But it’s very thick and sticky. Doesn’t read like an oil at all. Not sure if the other colors are the same but I don’t think I’d purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tell any and everyone that will listen how great this lip treatment is! It’s a hydrating, cushiony gloss with staying power. But the packaging is so terrible! I’ve ordered a few tubes since 2020 directly from Ami Coke and each time, they somehow leak from the lid and the tube, so it leaks no matter how you store it. I wish they’d fix it or give us a squeeze tube!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh yes, this lip gloss is a dream, superior to any of my luxury glosses.  For a gloss, it wears a very long time and is very moisturizing.

reviews.review_title: not for me ... a high shine sticky gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: bought this on a friend's recommendation...way too sticky. Even after taking it off I felt like I had a film left behind. The only pros were that it left a nice shine and was true to the shade I expected. probably would not buy any other shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is super shiny and hydrating on the lips. My lips are extremely dry and this product just fills in the lips line while not drying out the lips. The color threw me off a little because it says rosy brown in the description but it is a bit more of a brown shade than anything but I still really like it and would like to try other shades. The packing also feels really expensive and weighted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s so pretty and a nice thick hydrating formula with lasting shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip oil is SO amazing. It’s super hydrating and nourishing and doesn’t budge for what seems like an hour or more. My lips feel like heaven; even my husband commented on how long it was staying on his lips after a kiss. GREAT product! A+++

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is thick and sticky, but in the best of both ways. Thick in the sense that it optically smooths some of my toughest vertical lip lines, and sticky in that it hangs around for a nice long time. The color is sheer and user-friendly - no mirror required! It has the perfect touch of delicate vanilla scent. I usually scrape a little product off the chunky doe-foot before applying. I turn the cap back on tightly and I haven't experienced any goo leaking out of the component. It certainly leaves a residue on drinking vessels when freshly applied, but most lip goo does - c'est la vie!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for thicker lip balm/oil lovers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally love a thick lip balm/lip gloss so this was perfect for me! Smells like vanilla and lasts a super long time! The applicator has some cool ridges on it and it picks up the perfect amount of product in my opinion. I hate tinted lip balms/lip oils so this was perfect. It's slightly thicker than the dior, which i like. It's similar to the clarins lip oil in terms of thickness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Out of all the lip oils I have tried these are the most moisturizing and long lasting on my lips. The color excellence is the perfect nude for my lips. One downside is that it does leak put od the top a little bit. But not enough to make me stop using the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color! Quick and easy to apply. I would agree with some reviewers that the packaging could be improved so it doesn’t drip when the wand is removed but no less impressed!withproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on a whim and I’m liking it. It’s definitely not the consistency of an oil, it’s more of a thick lip gloss. This doesn’t bother me because it is hydrating and my lips don’t ever feel dry or icky once it’s removed. I got the shade bliss and there’s almost no pigment.

reviews.review_title: It's good but could be better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, it's enjoyable and comfortable to wear. It leaks quite a bit and the sponge applicator wobbles when applying it to my lips. Packaging needs work.

reviews.review_title: Almost a dupe for Patrick Ta  syringe lipgloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very similar to the Patrick Ta syringe lip gloss, but a little bit more pigment. Unfortunately, just not as flattering shade  as the Patrick Ta syringe lip gloss. Any drugstore lip gloss would be a better purchase. Due to the fact, this lipgloss is not that moisturizer nor does  the shade last very long. A drugstore lip gloss may be a better purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Smell! The Color! The Applicator! The Nourishment! This lip oil has done wonders for my occasionally dry lips. This has become my daily lip product. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color. Love the texture. Love the applicator. Love the staying power. Can't wait to see what else this new brand introduces!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful smooth and hydrating formula! Perfect sheer pop of color alone or over lipstick. One warning- the suction at the top of the tube will sometimes cause leaking after closing, which makes a big of a mess. Maybe don’t keep it in your purse. Hoping they fix this soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for about a month now and it’s quite nice. It has like a self-leveling quality so you get this extremely smooth, high shine almost laquer on your lips. It’s definitely thick but I like that, it means it’ll stay put. My complaints are that it smells like Elmers glue and the packaging leaks. I leave it upright in the inside pocket of my bag but sometimes it tips over and will leak all over the place even when the cap is on as tight as it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love lip oils but this didn’t even feel like my other lip oils at all! It wasn’t moisturizing and left my lips more dry after using it. It’s thick which I don’t mind but it’s very sticky and reminded me of Mac lip glasses. Bliss is a natural pick color but it doesn’t go on evenly and will cling to dry patches. Lastly, the packaging is faulty and the product leaks out causing a sticky mess in your bag. I’m really surprised by the high rating of this product which makes me think maybe I got a bad batch?  I returned this product and would have done so even if I got this on sale. Try in store and don’t order online like I did!

reviews.review_title: More shades, please! A must have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have Bliss and Smitten and these a Top Tier A+++ in lip oil, lip treatment,  lip anything. These are smooth, creamy, and have an excellent color payoff. Not sticky and lasting power is better than most of these types of products. Obsessed Yes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m giving this product 3 stars because I do like it for day time use. It does stay on for a long time, but wearing it at night to go to bed I haven’t had the best experience with that. It’s not very hydrating though. However it is very thick so you don’t need a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this in store after seeing a review. After trying it I ordered 2 more online. Bliss is also a great color. For me, the formula is very comforting and moisturizing. I prefer it over many high end ones. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many other lip treatments/oils/masks & it always seemed to help but only for a short while. This lip treatment oil is very soothing & hydrating on the lips. It’s by far the best multi-use product that actually works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this lip oil, I have every shade, I can’t get enough of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing amazing formula. My lips have not been dry since buying this a week ago and using it a few times daily. The formula is thick (but not sticky) so it stays put which is a must! Took off one star because packaging definitely needs improvement, as others have noted, the tube is too full and this causes leakage after a while. Fix the packaging and it’s a 10 out of 10! I want to try every color they are all gorgeous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely is a TREATMENT, I had super chapped lips and it healed them within hours, and even more so over night with only 2 applications. Absolutely a stunning neutral shade and gives a beautiful glossy finish. And it’s acne clinic approved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everything about this lip oil is great, just not for me. I love the color most of all and the shine is beautiful. The thing I don't get along with is how thick it is. It feels heavy on the lips and that wasn't what I was looking for.

reviews.review_title: i’ve had way better lip oils than this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i wanted to support a black owned indie brand so bought this in the new hot pink shade. it’s not bad but it is sticky and goopy, and doesn’t feel like a true lip oil. it also pools together where my lips meet. i feel like ive been spoiled by MAKE’s cult fav lip serum oil and by bobbi brown’s luxurious, completely non sticky, hydrating crushed oil infused gloss. despite my disappointment i still want to try the brown shade.

reviews.review_title: Wow. Made me a gloss lover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually wear lip gloss or lip oils,but this product converted me. The formula is thick, but it sits on my lips very nicely giving me that subtle tint. I also found it very moisturizing too.  Love that it's a clean product too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this lip oil for ages I love that it’s at Sephora now. It feels like it’s going to be heavy or sticky right when you put it on but it absorbs beautifully because it’s actually moisturizing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve repurchased this lip oil twice. it is somewhat sticky but the amount that i expect a gloss to be, so I don’t have any complaints about that. the shade is universally flattering and it smells/tastes so good! my only issue is that the packaging keeps leaking. i’m on my third tube now am am having the same problem. at first it’s fine, but after a few weeks, the tube starts to leak down the side. i make sure to keep it upright at all times, and i don’t put it in my bag but still it ends up leaking. really want to love it, i hope they do something about the packaging and i’d definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly became my favorite lip gloss, Just a pretty pinkish brown the works with every look. If you love Fenty's gloss bomb in chocolit, I think you would really enjoy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have all 4 of the lip treatment oils and I love them all. Smitten has the perfect tint of color where it’s not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It is so hydrating and the color is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this feels in my lips.  I use it on top of lip balm for just the right amount of shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip oil! It is everything !

reviews.review_title: Perfect for those who can never find a color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but this product is amazing. I have never been able to find a somewhat sheer formula that goes well with my skin tone. Smitten and excellence are perfect. One gives me a pink tint to my lips and one gives me a natural nude that I’ve beem lookinh for forever. Highly reccomend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Guys this is really sticky. Seriously I love having something thick on my lips but it didn’t feel plumping or hydrating at all, it just kinda sits on top of your lips like a laquer.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Shine, Long lasting Lip Moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW. Beautiful shine and my lips feel so moisturized! I have fair skin and wondered if Smitten would be too bright but its the perfect subtle tint with a beautiful gloss. The gloss is a little sticky going on, but the shine lasts longer than many glosses I've tried and quickly the sticky feeling goes away. I can't believe how soft my lips feel, the whole rest of the day they feel moisturized - even in Michigan winter. LOVE THIS STUFF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a great product! Nice and nourishing and I love the pigment it gives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hydrates my lips amazingly!! After the color and glossiness fades, my lips are soft and plush for hours! It also plumps my lips and moderately fills in my lip lines, all while being lightweight on the lips.   Smitten is very flattering on my medium-deep golden olive skin tone (Lisa Eldridge Seamless Skin 23, Dior 4WO)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for the perfectly tinted and hydrating lip oil, then you will love this. It’s not too sticky and gives the perfect hint of color with full hydration. I couldn’t ask for more. Also, I’ve tried other luxury lip oils (Dior) which are okay, but  definitely don’t have the color payoff I was expecting. Plus why spend $30 + when you can get better results with this one!

reviews.review_title: Go ahead and add to your cart lol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I kept seeing this on Tik Tok and was curious to see if the product truly matched the reviews. Let me just say, this lip oil is what’s up lol. I need to go ahead and buy another because I am already out. This is now my everyday go to for my lips and also use it on my lips at night before bed. It’s a one stop shop from using my Laneige lip mask (although I love that also) but it’s giving one and done. Don’t think about it and it gets sold out again like I did. Also perfect size fits right into my mommy crossbody purse lol. Buy it, it’s def worth it. Thank me later :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dark skin people! This is for us!!! Gorgeous subtle color, long lasting, feels more like gloss than oil. I'm so sad that smitten is limited edition, I just bought I second one for security.

reviews.review_title: This is why it’s probably already SOLD OUT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Where has this been all my life? If your lips could request a glass of water, this would be the thirst quencher! This is thee best color and texture in lip gloss ever!! And it ain’t sticky!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love love this lip gloss. Sooooo moisturizing, it has the moisture power of a lip balm but it’s a goooorrrrgeous high shine lip oil. If you want something easy and fun, this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm usually a satin lipstick person, but I've been trying out lip oils since winter began (lips are dry and crusty). None of them ever kept my lips so glossy and hydrated and lasted as long as this one. I do have to reapply, but that's fine with me since I gotta eat lol. It is smaller than the average lip product, so I go through it faster than expected.  I took a risk getting it, as it had a few reviews, and I've never regretted it. I turned my sister onto it, and she's not a makeup person. I'm on my 2nd one already, and I'm on my way to the store to stock up on more for us.   I got the brown one, and it adds a slight tint to my pink lips and compliments my sister's more brown lips. We would definitely try these in more colours, but the brown one is the perfect everyday lip. Gonna reapply now lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is supper hydrating, very pretty. I was surprised ￼at how much pigment it had since most lip oils don’t, but it is gorgeous. Love this and definitely will be getting more!

reviews.review_title: BEST lip oils i have ever tried!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw one tik tok review and immediately jumped on sephora and ordered all 4 colors and am so happy i did. these lip oils are amazing!! they give such a high gloss finish and feel so nourishing and hydrating. they are thick in a good way and last a decent amount of time for being an oil. 10/10 recommend and will absolutely restock when i run out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is phenomenal and is absolutely a lip treatment, in that it has made my lips better with use. Very plump and glossy look that is NOT goopy. Perfect formula and hint of color. Will be buying them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally obsessed with this lip oil treatment not a stretch to say it’s the best one so far! Not sticky at all stays on far a while and leaves my lips soft without the white film ordering more immediately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip oil/gloss I’ve ever used. Obsessed with the color and feel, I might order a couple more to keep in the car and office.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, but it is honestly the most sticky lip product I’ve ever used. It felt like I had glue on my lips and was even hard to remove with water and makeup remover. Beautiful shine though.

reviews.review_title: This lip oil will always be in my purse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip oil is the best I’ve tried so far! It makes my lips look so smooth and juicy. It’s not sticky and it’s very hydrating. It gives me a natural color and gorgeous shine. You need this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip gloss formula I have ever tried. I find it very hydrating on the lips. It’s thick so it wears well but not sticky at all. And the color is so beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So moisturizing and you feel it for hours a must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss. I got it and applied it, and it feels like a lip oil and lip gloss. It is so cushiony and balmy and not sticky. It has a light vanilla scent, and the tint isn't too pigmented. This is gonna be my go-to gloss while I work or go out. I think this color is also good for me as this is the most neutral choice. And for $20, it is a steal compared to other more high end priced glosses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love. I bought smitten first, love the color and texture so I went out and bought bliss too.  These are SO nice and they are thicc but not uncomfortable. I love the applicator and the fact that it’s not obscenely overpriced like a lot of other lip products are these days (Dior

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect consistency and does a great job of hydrating while providing some sheer color! The product stays on your lips similarly to the Dior lip oil and isn't heavy feeling. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was never really into lip oil until I tried this brand. I love it. I have all the colors except for the clear one and I would recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased and used several lip oils and lip balms over the years. By far this is my favorite. I’ve seen this brand for a while now, and was so happy when it finally came to Sephora. This is a must buy. It’s on the thicker side. Nonetheless it’s hydrating, creamy and shiny goodnes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment oil is my new favorite lip product! It smells lovely & gives a nice, subtle wash of color. My favorite part is, I think, the applicator. It disperses the oil evenly so its not goopy or sticky at all. I have both this color & the chocolate brown - both are great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color of this is gorgeous, I swatched it on my hand and was excited to put it on when I got home. I was extremely disappointed when I did. It was thick and sticky and felt like a gross glob. I would buy the tower 28 lip jellies instead. I returned this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is like a very sticky, gloopy lipgloss and not at all what I was expecting in a lip oil or treatment product. I would not repurchase, but it does have a lovely vanilla scent and glossy shine, and I can see why others might really love it. This is just not a good fit for me, a lip oil lover looking for a great lip treatment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so disappointed in this product. It’s not a lip oil, it’s a sticky balm, a very sticky balm. It’s extremely thick too so much so that it’s hard to rub the product together on my lips. I have an extra star for the clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this one 2 days ago and I love it! Not sticky at all and it feels thick, and the pigment is great! My go to gloss now. I’m def going to buy some more colors!

reviews.review_title: This color brings my lips to life!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love that this color brings some brightness out of skin tone! The description says bright pink but I think it’s more of a juicy cherry red. Feels hesuper nourishing on the lips!! I have pretty pigmented lips-brownish pink I would say naturally. So this color gives my lips some vibrancy and life!! Especially when I’m not wearing any makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too sticky for me and has a weird taste. Not really a fan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is one of the most nourishing lip products i've used in a while! the texture is more thick, similar to a gloss, but that's been perfect for me during this winter. i highly recommend if you're seeking something to deliver moisture in a cute shade :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Excellence was included in a customizable set I purchased directly from the brand before Sephora started carrying Ami Cole. This is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  WHAT I LIKE:  * Hydrating and nourishing  * Not sticky or tacky * Comfortable to wear  * Applies easily and smoothly  * Leaves a beautiful, glossy shine on lips * Wears down evenly   AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT:  * Would love to see more shades, please  FYI / OTHER THOUGHTS:  * Excellence is described as a pretty rosy brown shade. I don’t get much of the rosiness from it; leans more neutral light brown on me. It looks like it would be flattering on many skin tones * Unscented  * Doe foot applicator   BUY, BUY, BUY 🛍️ or BYE-BYE 👋🏼?:  * BUY, BUY, BUY 🛍️  * I'll be picking up the other shade, Bliss, soon

I am absolutely adore this product! On its own or with a lip liner, it performed wonderfully! There was no sticky feeling, white residue or weird taste! I will be recommending this to all of my clients !

Runny like other lip oils, but once it's on it feels like a slippery lip gloss. (So a little sticky if you're drinking or eating.) Extremely shiny, it gives me glass lips. The pink is very soft and natural and looks really good on two toned lips. It smells like mac lipsticks! Just to warn you- if you add too much, it will get in your mouth and it will taste very bad.

Lipgloss is a hit-or-miss product for me for many reasons. It can be too sticky, too slippery or sometimes just overall not the right look for me. I honestly feel like Ami Cole has checked all those boxes and more for me. The product packaging alone is an amazing experience. The applicator is thick and juicy - the cutest thing I've ever seen. And then the product itself is the most gorgeous shade and as the product wears throughout the day, your lips truly feel so soft and moisturized. 10/10 product for me.

Definitely not the lip oil for me. Feels thick on the lips and not in the best way. I actually purchased the trio set through Ami Cole so can comment on all 3 current shades. Clear is fairly shiny on the lips. The pink is a flattering neutral pink. The excellence shade is described as a rosy brown but color is more of a light nude brown and applied the most unevenly in my experience.

My dry lips have never felt better. I can’t believe this product is this good. Super hydrating, very thick, very shiny, stays on for a long time. Color Doesn’t really show up on my pigmented lips. But this oil is excellent quality and I’ll be repurchasing for sure!
